name: gitversion-setup
description: Easy Semantic Versioning (https://semver.org) for projects using Git
author: GitTools Contributors

inputs.name: versionSpec
inputs.label: The version spec
inputs.helpMarkDown: Required version in the form of 6.2.x or exact version like 6.2.0

inputs.name: includePrerelease
inputs.label: Include pre-release versions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include pre-release versions when matching a version

inputs.name: ignoreFailedSources
inputs.label: Treat package source failures as warnings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Treat package source failures as warnings

inputs.name: preferLatestVersion
inputs.label: Prefer latest version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Prefer to download the latest version matching the versionSpec, even if there is a local cached version.
